name: Bark 2.0
desc: A web app that allows users to search for local and national parks to take their furry friends.  Built with Bulma CSS framework, Handlebars.js, MySQL, Node, and Express.js

name: What's Happenin'
desc: A React web app that allows users to create and share events and reactions with other users.  Built with Bootstrap on the front end and GraphQL on the back end.

name: Budget Tracker
desc: An easy to use Progressive Web Application that allows users to monitor transactions over time, with or without an internet connection.

name: Note Taker
desc: A simple Express.js app that allows users to write and store notes.

name: Password Generator
desc: A web app built with only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that provides users with randomly generated passwords based on criteria provided by answers they provide to a series of prompts.

name: Workday Scheduler
desc: A web application that manages a standard work day schedule from 9 AM to 5 PM, with time blocks for every hour.  The scheduler will also save previous user input and color code time blocks based on if they're past due, current, or future tasks.
